namespace Config;

/**
 * Configuration Class.
 */
class Developer
{
	/** Turn the possibility to change generatedtype */
	public static $CHANGE_GENERATEDTYPE = true;

	/** Enable minimize JS files */
	public static $MINIMIZE_JS = false;

	/** Enable minimize CSS files */
	public static $MINIMIZE_CSS = false;

	/** Change of fields visibility */
	public static $CHANGE_VISIBILITY = true;

	/** Adding/Deleting relations between modules. */
	public static $CHANGE_RELATIONS = true;

	/** Developer libraries update mode */
	public static $MISSING_LIBRARY_DEV_MODE = true;

	/** Developer libraries update mode */
	public static $LANGUAGES_UPDATE_DEV_MODE = true;

	/** Developer updater mode */
	public static $updaterDevMode = true;
}
